color_step.title: Color Step
color_step.description: Amount of color change per beat

frequency_range.title: Frequency Range
frequency_range.description: Frequency range for the beat detection

invert_roll.title: Invert Roll
invert_roll.description: Invert the direction of the gradient roll

color_cycler.title: Color Cycler
color_cycler.description: Change colors in time with the beat

mixing_mode.title: Mixing Mode
mixing_mode.description: Mode of combining each frequencies' colors

contrast.title: Contrast
contrast.description: Difference between lighter and darker spots

frequency_range.title: Frequency Range
frequency_range.description: Frequency range for the beat detection

color_step.title: Color Step
color_step.description: Amount of color change per beat

lows_color.title: Lows Color
lows_color.description: color for low sounds, ie beats

mids_color.title: Mids Color
mids_color.description: color for mid sounds, ie vocals

high_color.title: High Color
high_color.description: color for high sounds, ie hi hat

gradient.title: Gradient
gradient.description: Color scheme for bass strobe to cycle through

color_step.title: Color Step
color_step.description: Amount of color change per bass strobe

bass_strobe_decay_rate.title: Bass Strobe Decay Rate
bass_strobe_decay_rate.description: Bass strobe decay rate. Higher -> decays faster.

strobe_decay_rate.title: Strobe Decay Rate
strobe_decay_rate.description: Percussive strobe decay rate. Higher -> decays faster.

threshold.title: Threshold
threshold.description: Cutoff for quiet sounds. Higher -> only loud sounds are detected

strobe_decay.title: Strobe Decay
strobe_decay.description: How rapidly a single strobe hit fades. Higher -> faster fade

beat_decay.title: Beat Decay
beat_decay.description: How much the strobes fade across the beat. Higher -> less bright strobes towards end of beat
